name: Ignis
description: A high-octane striker who uses plasma-infused gauntlets to punch through defenses.
lore: Ignis was once a factory worker in the lower sectors of Neo-Veridia. After an industrial accident fused his arms with experimental plasma cutters, he turned to the underground arena circuit.
tip1: Use Rocket Dash to close the gap or escape dangerous situations.
tip2: Meteor Strike is best used when enemies are clustered together.
tip3: Activate Overheat before engaging in a brawl for maximum damage output.

name: Zenith
description: A cybernetic monk who manipulates energy fields to protect allies and disrupt foes.
lore: Once a peaceful monastery guardian now enhanced with cybernetic implants to protect the innocent.
tip1: Position yourself safely behind your team.
tip2: Use barriers strategically to split enemy formations.
tip3: Your ultimate can turn the tide of team fights.
